name: Luxury Beach Resort
descriptions: A beautiful beachfront resort with stunning ocean views, premium amenities, and world-class service.

name: Mountain View Cabin
descriptions: A cozy wooden cabin with breathtaking mountain views, perfect for a peaceful getaway.

name: City Center Apartment
descriptions: A modern apartment in the heart of the city, close to major attractions and public transport.

name: Jungle Eco Lodge
descriptions: An eco-friendly lodge in the middle of the jungle, offering adventure and nature experiences.

name: Lakefront Cottage
descriptions: A charming cottage by the lake, ideal for relaxation and water activities.

name: Desert Safari Camp
descriptions: A traditional desert camp offering camel rides, cultural performances, and a starry night experience.

name: Snowy Mountain Chalet
descriptions: A luxurious chalet in the snowy mountains, perfect for ski lovers and winter adventures.

name: Floating Houseboat
descriptions: A unique houseboat experience on calm waters, combining comfort and scenic views.

name: Countryside Farmstay
descriptions: A peaceful farmstay surrounded by greenery, fresh air, and organic farm experiences.

name: Treehouse Adventure
descriptions: A treehouse stay in the middle of the forest, offering a unique and thrilling experience.
